attributes.action: Cut aid given to other countries and divert the money into our NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown boasts of the millions given away to other countries in aid. Our country is grinding to a halt and the NHS is suffering too, the money saved could pay for hundreds of nurses, drs or even new hospitals.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
